text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Kono lokadala an'ya lokadalake upahasa karabe na, hayato tara edera ca'ite besi bhala, ara kono narira'o an'ya naridera karabe na, hayato tara edera ca'ite besi bhala, ara tomara tomadera nijera lokadera ninda karo na, ara tomara parasparake upaname deko na. Imana anara pare adharmikatara nama kamano bara'i manda. Ara ye ke'u na phere, tabe tara'i khoda atyacari.
